item.title: Repost from shanselman https://twitter.com/shanselman/statuses/582347406986993664/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from shanselman https://twitter.com/shanselman/statuses/582347406986993664/:

People say “if you truly loved your job, you’d be energized coming back from vacation.”

Sure, but I like napping more. #realtalk
